title: WeBuilda â€“ Build your online presence effortlessly with WeBuilda, the micro SaaS tool offering intuitive drag-and-drop templates
introduction: The website offers a simple pricing model that scales with the needs of businesses of all sizes. It provides different plans for solo founders, small teams, large teams, agencies, and organizations.
targetPeople: Solo founders, individuals, small teams, large teams, agencies, organizations
pricing: Flexible pricing model with options for monthly and yearly subscriptions

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a free trial perfect for platform testing.

faqs.question: What is included in the Basic Plan?
faqs.answer: The Basic Plan includes 2 Sites, 500 MB of Storage, Custom Domain, Drag and Drop Builder, 10,000 Ai Credits (Text, Images), 5 WorkSpace Projects, and Team Collaboration and Invite.

faqs.question: Who is the Pro Plan suitable for?
faqs.answer: The Pro Plan is suitable for large sized teams, agencies, and organizations, offering unlimited sites, AI image & text tokens, storage, custom domains, workspaces, website export, and team invites.
